name: grocy
description: Grocy is a self-hosted grocery and household management solution. It tracks inventory, shopping lists, chores, tasks, and meal planning through a clean and responsive web UI with barcode support.

features.title: Inventory Tracking
features.description: Monitor food and household items with quantity tracking and expiration dates

features.title: Shopping Lists
features.description: Create and manage shopping lists with automatic suggestions based on inventory

features.title: Meal Planning
features.description: Plan meals and automatically generate shopping lists from recipes

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Add products quickly using barcode scanner via mobile app or webcam

features.title: Recipe Management
features.description: Store recipes with ingredients and automatically track inventory usage

features.title: Chore Tracking
features.description: Schedule and track household chores and maintenance tasks

features.title: Battery Management
features.description: Monitor battery-powered devices and track battery replacements

features.title: Waste Reduction
features.description: Reduce food waste by tracking expiration dates and consumption patterns
